price: Musa aramubwira ati: “Ivyo vyashitse rero, ni co kimenyetso twarondera kidushikana aho umuja mweranda ari”. Ni ho rero basubira inyuma bagenda bakurikira ibirenge gushika kuri nya buye.
arabic: قَالَ ذَٰلِكَ مَا كُنَّا نَبۡغِۚ فَٱرۡتَدَّا عَلَىٰٓ ءَاثَارِهِمَا قَصَصٗا

meta.transliteration: qāla dhālika mā kunnā nabghi fa-ir'taddā ʿalā āthārihimā qaṣaṣan
